# tg_policies (Data Source)

Fetches policies from Trustgrid



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `name_filter` (String) Filter policies by name (substring match)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `names` (Set of String) List of matching policy names
- `policies` (List of Object) List of policies (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--policies))

<a id="nestedatt--policies"></a>
### Nested Schema for `policies`

Read-Only:

- `description` (String)
